title: Digital Drug Lord
author: Digital Drug Lord
content: I heard they will pass laws banning the mining of bit coin in america because its to bad for the enviornment so I was looking for a proof of work coin so if someone say leaves the PC on they can get paid little by little.are all proof of work coins the same? are the as safe as proof of work?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Digital Drug Lord on January 14, 2023, 04:08:02 PMI heard they will pass laws banning the mining of bit coin in america because its to bad for the enviornment so I was looking for a proof of work coin so if someone say leaves the PC on they can get paid little by little.are all proof of work coins the same? are the as safe as proof of work?Your title says one thing, but in your post you ask for another, what are you really looking for?By the way, where did you get the information about the plan to ban bitcoin mining? Are you sure it's not just fake news?

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on January 14, 2023, 09:27:29 PMYour title says one thing, but in your post you ask for another, what are you really looking for?By the way, where did you get the information about the plan to ban bitcoin mining? Are you sure it's not just fake news?I think that OP's nick answers the question of why topic is not related to thread and why there are so many mistakes. Mr. Digital DRUG LORD - please do at least a 24h detox from drugs before interacting with others here on bitcointalk.
